title: Definitions
context: [PART VII.] AUTOMATED VICTIM INFORMATION AND NOTIFICATION SYSTEM [ยง353-131] Definitions. For purposes of this part: &ldquo;Offender&rdquo; means a person in the custody of the department of public safety or the Hawaii paroling authority but does not include juveniles under the jurisdiction of the family court. &ldquo;System&rdquo; means the statewide automated victim information and notification system. &ldquo;Victim&rdquo; means a person against whom a crime has been committed by the offender and includes, in homicide cases, surviving immediate family members. [L 2012, c 190, pt of ยง1]
